title: Books
description: Reading is one of the most important part in my life. So, here are the book recomendation for you.

title: Blogs
description: I was always told to write down whatever there is that troubles me. It always helps me. Hope you find meaning reading them.

title: Quotes
description: There is something unique about quotes. They motivates and inspires you. So, tap to see some what my favourites are.

title: Photos
description: Taking pictures and visiting new places gives me the enjoyment and remind me of being alive.

title: Trails
description: I'm not a pro-athlete by any means but I always had this idea of doing adventure. Hiking has always been an affordable way to live that adventure life.

title: Languages
description: Tap in to see how I got into computer science field and to learn more on my journey so far.
